covideu 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    covideu

    The goal of covideu is to provide the main dataset used to create COVID-19 in EU app, along with several datasets that had been processed through data wrangling. In addition, three functions are developed to enable simpler and easier coding process within App.R.

    Installation

    The development version can be installed from GitHub with:

    # install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("etc5523-2020/r-package-assessment-jlee0179")

    Example

    This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

    library(covideu)
#> Loading required package: shiny
library(tibble)
owid
#> # A tibble: 48,169 x 41
#>    iso_code continent location date       total_cases new_cases new_cases_smoot…

#>  4 ABW      North Am… Aruba    2020-03-21          NA        NA            0.286

select1country()
